meanings.definition: Ring Lardner (1885–1933), American short story writer and sports columnist.
meanings.english_definition: Ring Lardner (1885–1933), an American short story writer and sports columnist.

etymology.value: From the Irish surname Ó Lórdáin, meaning 'descendant of Lórdán'. The personal name Lórdán is a diminutive of Lórd, meaning 'lord'.
